title: 696 - Cloudy Hide and Seek - Stan Chronicles Ep 7
description:
After smelling baked goods Scooter and Stan search for a cloud puppy. You'll drift off like a vapor.

(You can find all of our sponsors or become a patron on our new website http://www.sleepwithmepodcast.com story starts at about 18:35)
